definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.chinese: 對此，弗格森是領教過的。

sentences.english: Ferguson once derided the modern-day City as being "all talk".
sentences.chinese: 弗格森曾經嘲笑這支曼城隊“光說不做”。

sentences.english: "I know Real Madrid were hovering and so were Benfica, " Ferguson said.
sentences.chinese: “我知道皇馬和本菲卡都有興趣，”弗格森說。

sentences.english: "The European Championship derails transfer activity, " said Sir Alex.
sentences.chinese: “歐洲盃讓轉會市場冷清下來，”弗格森爵士說。

sentences.english: However, at least one big signing - with a new striker looking the most pressing need for Ferguson - was expected.
sentences.chinese: 不過，弗格森依然期望着能夠簽下一名重量級的前鋒。

sentences.english: "Alan's done a great job at Newcastle, " continued Sir Alex.
sentences.chinese: “帕杜在紐卡乾的很好，”弗格森爵士說。

sentences.english: Sir Alex Ferguson expects Gabriel Heinze back in training for Manchester United in a fortnight.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森爵士希望海因策在兩週內回曼聯參加訓練。

sentences.english: Sir Alex also singled him out for special mention in his post-match interview.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森爵士在賽後接受採訪的時候也特別提到了哈格。

sentences.english: Sir Alex feels Mark Clattenburg's decision to allow Nani's late goal against Tottenham to stand was the correct one.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森爵士覺得裁判判定納尼的進球有效是對的。

sentences.english: Allardyce and Moyes are close friends of Ferguson.
sentences.chinese: 阿勒代斯和莫耶斯都是弗格森的親密朋友。

sentences.english: "I can see him playing on next season, " declared Sir Alex.
sentences.chinese: “我認爲他下賽季還能繼續踢，”弗格森爵士說。

sentences.english: "I have to congratulate my lads, " said Sir Alex.
sentences.chinese: “我必須祝賀小夥子們，”弗格森爵士說。

sentences.english: Of course, as Ferguson would remind you, United had its share of poor calls, too.
sentences.chinese: 當然，弗格森會提醒你，曼聯也有走背運的時候。

sentences.english: Ferguson was also this to closure, Sir.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森也由此被封爲了爵士。

sentences.english: Ferguson created “Fergie Time” out of sheer force of will.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森全憑頑強的毅力創造了“弗格森時間”。

sentences.english: Ferguson created “Fergie Time” out of sheer force of will.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森全憑頑強的毅力創造了“弗格森時間”。

definition: Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
Lester or Leicester (name)/Leicester, English city in East Midlands
